Package game.environments

Class Altar

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.Ground
game.environments.Altar
All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.capabilities.Capable, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.displays.Printable, Buyable
public class Altar extends edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.Ground implements Buyable
A class that inherits from Ground. The Player can make offering using Runes in exchange for Sacred Tears. Implements Buyable as they can be used to "buy" Sacred Tears. Created by:
Version:
1.0
Author:
Bryan Wong Modified by:

  • Constructor Details

    • Altar

      public Altar(int offeringPrice, int offeringIncrement, int offeringLimit, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item divineBlessing)
      Altar Constructor. Calls parent class to set inherited data attributes.
      Parameters:
      offeringPrice - : The amount of Runes that needs to be offered in exchange for Sacred Tears.
      offeringIncrement - : The amount of Runes to increment the offeringPrice once an offering is performed.
      offeringLimit - : The limit of offerings allowed on this Altar.
      divineBlessing - : The Item the Player will be blessed with once sufficient offerings are given.
